subject: Technology
title: The Metaverse: Hype or Future?
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Metaverse: Hype or Future?.

hook.text: Facebook renamed itself Meta and bet its future on a virtual world nobody asked for.

buildup.text: The metaverse promises persistent virtual worlds where you work, play, shop, and socialize as an avatar.

discovery.text: Games like Roblox and Fortnite already feel metaverse-like. Players hang out, attend events, and build together.

twist.text: Meta spent over $40 billion and delivered cartoonish avatars with no legs. The public was underwhelmed.

climax.text: The metaverse may come, but it will probably grow from games, not from corporate announcements.

punchline.text: The metaverse already exists. It just doesn't look like a boardroom presentation.

quiz.question: Which platforms already resemble a metaverse?
